notes: This manifest lists public datasets and partially/closed-access datasets with instructions. Do not redistribute datasets; respect licenses.

datasets.name: FDMSE-ISL
instructions: Review upstream repository for access and license.
Place downloaded content under data/raw/fdmse-isl/
Include a README.txt citing FDMSE-ISL.

datasets.name: Kaggle ISL Collections
instructions: Requires Kaggle CLI and API credentials.
Run scripts/download_datasets.py --use-kaggle --only kaggle-isl-sets
Datasets will be placed under data/raw/kaggle-isl/

datasets.name: ISLTranslate (Exploration-Lab)
instructions: Repo includes metadata and examples; full dataset may require steps
Place large assets under data/raw/isltranslate/

datasets.name: WLASL (Word-Level ASL)
instructions: Clone metadata repo; videos require separate download steps per WLASL instructions.
Create data/raw/wlasl/README.txt with citation.

datasets.name: RWTH-PHOENIX-Weather 2014T
instructions: Register with RWTH per official instructions.
Do not include data in repo. Place locally under data/raw/phoenix14t/
Include README.txt noting license and citation.

datasets.name: ASLLVD
instructions: Follow BU instructions for access.
Store locally in data/raw/asllvd/ with README.txt

datasets.name: ISLAN (Mendeley)
instructions: Download after accepting license on Mendeley.
Place contents under data/raw/islan/

datasets.name: How2Sign
instructions: Request access from authors.
Place files under data/raw/how2sign/ with README.txt

datasets.name: Small Gesture Datasets
instructions: Includes emergency gestures, alphabet sets.
Use Kaggle or GitHub links; place under data/raw/small-gestures/
